document.full_text: spain said on wednesday it was considering legal action against german regional authorities for blaming its produce for an e. coli outbreak that has killed 16 people in germany, sweden and other countries.
document.title: spain mulls action against hamburg for e.coli blame
lines_and_colors: spain said on wednesday it was considering legal action against german regional authorities for blaming its produce for an e. coli outbreak that has killed 16 people in germany, sweden and other countries.
